name: SeatArranger
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: seat arranger
des:
When you cannot decide the seat order well, the seat arranger is useful.

First of all, please tell me how many people are in your room. Next, please tell everyone's first name one by one. Finally, Alexa decides the seating order and answers.

For parties, meetings and more!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
